xdi2.messaging.container.factory.impl.uri

Class RegistryUriMessagingContainerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.messaging.container.factory.impl.AbstractMessagingContainerFactory
      • xdi2.messaging.container.factory.impl.uri.UriMessagingContainerFactory
        • xdi2.messaging.container.factory.impl.uri.PrototypingUriMessagingContainerFactory
          • xdi2.messaging.container.factory.impl.uri.RegistryUriMessagingContainerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingContainerFactory

    public class RegistryUriMessagingContainerFactory
extends PrototypingUriMessagingContainerFactory
    This messaging container factory uses a "registry graph" as a basis to decide what messaging containers to create.
    Author:
    markus
